forum.content:
Sometimes we hear gonna be ok,but,the true is not ok.
這首歌帶點blue ，在述說一個人想去刪除記憶，但是在過程中卻是很掙扎！很喜歡他這段歌詞
So tell me now
When every star falls from the sky.
And every last heart in the world breaks.
Oh hold me now
When every ship is going down.
I don't feel nothing when I hear you say.
情境寫的很貼切.

forum.title: Ok?
